briefdescription.para: Creates a new project, possibly also loading a workspace located at workspaceFilePath.

parameterdescription.para: File path of the workspace to load (will not attempt to load workspace if empty)

briefdescription.para: Creates a new project with default system view plugins (either on the left or right, other alignments are ignored)

parameterdescription.para: Alignment of the default plugins
Whether to add a logging view at the bottom

briefdescription.para: Creates a new blank project (without any view plugins or data)
Open project from filePath.

parameterdescription.para: File path of the project (choose file path when empty)
Whether to only import the data from the project
Whether to load the workspace which is accompanied by the project

memberdef.argsstring: (QUrl url, const QString &targetDirectory="", bool importDataOnly=false, bool loadWorkspace=true)=0
memberdef.name: openProject

briefdescription.para: Download project from url, store it in targetDir and open it.

parameterdescription.para: URL of the project
Directory where the project is stored (temporary directory when empty)
Whether to only import the data from the project
Whether to load the workspace which is accompanied by the project

briefdescription.para: Download project from url and store it in the default downloaded projects directory.

Directory where the project is stored (default is empty, which means the default downloaded projects directory)

briefdescription.para: Establish asynchronously whether the project at url is updated with respect to the last downloaded version.

simplesect.para: Future containing a boolean determining whether the project is stale (true) or not (false)

briefdescription.para: Get the directory where downloaded projects are stored.
